    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static int open()
        Open the contactless card reader.
        Returns:
        value == 0, error ; value != 0 , correct handle

      • isOpened

        public static boolean isOpened()
        Contactless card reader is Opened return Boolean
        Returns:
        value == true, reader has opened ; value != 0 , reader not open.

      • close

        public static int close()
        Close the contactless card reader.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success ; value < 0, error code

      • searchBegin

        public static int searchBegin(int nCardMode,
              int nFlagSearchAll,
              int nTimeout_MS)
        语义代表通知非接设备开始寻卡， Start searching the contactless1 card If you set the nCardMode is auto, reader will try to activate card in type A, type B and type successively; If you set the nCardMode is type A, type B, or type C, reader only try to activate card in the specified way.
        Parameters:
        nCardMode - : handle of this card reader possible value : CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_AUTO = 0 CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_A = 1; CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_B = 2; CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_C = 3;
        nFlagSearchAll - : 0 : signal user if we find one card in the field, 1 : signal user only we find all card in the field。
        nTimeout_MS - : time out in milliseconds. if nTimeout_MS is less then zero, the searching process is infinite.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • searchEnd

        public static int searchEnd()
        Stop the process of searching card.
        Returns:
        :value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • attach

        public static int attach(byte[] byteArrayATR)
        Attach the target before transmitting apdu command In this process, the target(card) is activated and return ATR.
        Parameters:
        byteArrayATR: - ATR buffer, if you set it null, you can not get the data.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process and return length of ATR; value < 0, error code

      • detach

        public static int detach()
        Detach the target. If you want to send APDU again, you should attach it.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • transmit

        public static int transmit(byte[] byteArrayAPDU,
           int nAPDULength,
           byte[] byteArrayResponse)
        Transmit APDU command and get the response
        Parameters:
        byteArrayAPDU - : command of APDU。
        nAPDULength - : length of command of APDU.
        byteArrayResponse - : response of command of APDU。
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • sendControlCommand

        public static int sendControlCommand(int nCmdID,
                     byte[] byteArrayCmdData,
                     int nDataLength)
        Send control command.
        Parameters:
        nCmdID - : id of command.
        byteArrayCmdData - : data associated with command, if no data, you can set it NULL.
        nDataLength - : data length of command.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • verify

        public static int verify(int nSectorIndex,
         int nPinType,
         byte[] strPin,
         int nPinLength)
        Verify pin only for MiFare one card.
        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index.
        nPinType - : 0 : Key A 1 : Key B.
        strPin - : password of this pin.
        nPinLength - : length of password.
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • read

        public static int read(int nSectorIndex,
       int nBlockIndex,
       byte[] pDataBuffer,
       int nDataBufferLength)
        Read data only for MiFare one card.
        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index。
        nBlockIndex - : block index。
        pDataBuffer - : data buffer。
        nDataBufferLength - : buffer length return value.
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.'

      • write

        public static int write(int nSectorIndex,
        int nBlockIndex,
        byte[] pData,
        int nDataLength)
        Write data only for MiFare one card.
        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index.
        nBlockIndex - : block index.
        pData - : data.
        nDataLength - : data length.
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • queryInfo

        public static int queryInfo(int[] pHasMoreCards,
            int[] pCardType)
        Query the number and type of cards on the contactless card reader.
        Parameters:
        nHandle - : handle of this card reader
        pHasMoreCards - : 0 : only one PICC in the field 0x0A : more cards in the field(type A) 0x0B : more cards in the field(type B) 0xAB : more cards in the field(type A and type B)
        pCardType - : CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_CPU 0x0000 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_B_CPU 0x0100 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_CLASSIC_MINI 0x0001 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_CLASSIC_1K 0x0002 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_CLASSIC_4K 0x0003 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_UL_64 0x0004 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_UL_192 0x0005 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_MP_2K_SL1 0x0006 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_MP_4K_SL1 0x0007 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_MP_2K_SL2 0x0008 CONTACTLESS_CARD_TYPE_A_MP_4K_SL2 0x0009 CONTACTLESS_CARD_UNKNOWN 0x00FF.
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • readValue

        public static int readValue(int nSectorIndex,
            int nBlockIndex,
            byte[] pValue,
            int nValueBufLength,
            byte[] pAddrData)
        Read value from a block
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • writeValue

        public static int writeValue(int nSectorIndex,
             int nBlockIndex,
             int pValue,
             int nValueLength,
             byte pAddrData)
        Write value to a block.
        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index.
        nBlockIndex - : block index.
        pValue - : data for saving value. LSB, 4bytes.
        nValueBufLength - : must be 4.
        pAddrData - : one byte, for saving a user data.
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • increment

        public static int increment(int nSectorIndex,
            int nBlockIndex,
            int value)
        Increment value to a block, using it with the API : hal_contactless_card_mc_restore and hal_contactless_card_mc_transfer
        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index
        nBlockIndex - : block index
        pValue - : buffer for saving value. LSB, 4bytes
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • decrement

        public static int decrement(int nSectorIndex,

        Parameters:
        nSectorIndex - : sector index
        nBlockIndex - : block index
        value - : buffer for saving value. LSB, 4bytes
        Returns:
        value >= 0 : success; value < 0, error code.

      • touch

        public static int touch()
